hero.title: Empowering Religious Education Through Technology
hero.description: We're on a mission to make religious education accessible, engaging, and meaningful for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that religious education should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or location. Our platform combines traditional wisdom with modern technology to create an engaging learning experience.
mission.imageAlt: Team members collaborating on religious education projects

values.title: Accessibility
values.description: Making religious education available to everyone, anywhere in the world.

values.title: Authenticity
values.description: Preserving the integrity and depth of religious teachings while making them accessible.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Using technology to enhance the learning experience without compromising tradition.

values.title: Community
values.description: Building a global community of learners and educators.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Our diverse team brings together expertise in religious studies, education, and technology.

members.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
members.bio: Ph.D. in Comparative Religion with 15 years of experience in religious education.

members.name: Michael Rodriguez
members.bio: Former tech lead at major edtech companies, passionate about making education accessible.

members.name: Dr. Aisha Patel
members.bio: Expert in religious texts and digital education with a focus on cultural sensitivity.

items.question: How can I get started with the platform?
items.answer: You can sign up for a free account and explore our basic resources. For full access, choose a subscription plan that suits your needs.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are secure and encrypted.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

form.errorMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again later.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of learners and educators in our religious education community.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find answers to common questions about our religious education platform.

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: You can create an account by clicking the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner. You'll need to provide your email address and create a password. After verification, you'll have access to our basic resources.

questions.question: What are the system requirements?
questions.answer: Our platform works on any modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) and is optimized for both desktop and mobile devices. You'll need a stable internet connection for the best experience.

questions.question: Is there a mobile app?
questions.answer: Yes, we have mobile apps available for both iOS and Android devices. You can download them from the App Store or Google Play Store.

questions.question: What subscription plans are available?
questions.answer: We offer several subscription plans: Free (basic access), Standard (full access to resources), and Premium (includes additional features and priority support). Visit our pricing page for detailed information.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period. No refunds are provided for partial months.

questions.question: Do you offer discounts for institutions?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer special pricing for educational institutions, religious organizations, and group subscriptions. Contact our sales team for more information.

questions.question: What languages are supported?
questions.answer: Our platform currently supports 22 languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, Chinese, and more. We're continuously adding new languages.

questions.question: Can I download content for offline use?
questions.answer: Yes, most of our content can be downloaded for offline use. This feature is available on both desktop and mobile platforms.

questions.question: How often is new content added?
questions.answer: We regularly update our content library with new materials, courses, and resources. Major updates occur monthly, with smaller additions throughout the week.

questions.question: How can I get technical support?
questions.answer: You can reach our technical support team through the 'Help' section in your account, email us at support@zion.fm, or use our live chat feature during business hours.

questions.question: What is your response time for support requests?
questions.answer: We aim to respond to all support requests within 24 hours. Premium subscribers receive priority support with faster response times.

questions.question: Do you offer training for new users?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive training sessions for new users and institutions. These can be scheduled through your account dashboard or by contacting our support team.

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still Have Questions?
stillHaveQuestions.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is here to help.

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account

termination.description: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to the platform at our sole discretion, without notice, for any reason.
